snap(-20,10,40) 

sky(240,150,15)
fog(240,150,15)
ground(240,150,15)
polys(243,176,75)

fadefrom(7000)
density(6)

name(No Way Through The Sandstorm)
nlaps(2)


set(47,0,0,0)p
set(23,0,2800,180)p
set(26,0,2800,0)p

set(23,0,19600,0)p
set(31,0,22909,0)pr 
set(31,0,27491,180)p
set(23,0,30800,180)p
